mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, birth= (select TO_CHAR(#{birth}), 'YYYY.MM.DD') from member, gender=#{gender}, point=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select id from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, email, birth, gender) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{gender})
